aboutMe: As a front-end developer, I bring in-depth experience in crafting web applications. I excel in design, utilizing prototyping tools to bring concepts to life and developing and ensuring pixel-perfect, responsive designs that adhere to modern standards. My proficiency extends to popular JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, and Typescript. I implement various design patterns to enhance front-end development, including Single-Page Applications and Microfrontends. Engaging directly with clients on international projects, I gather application requirements following Agile methodology principles. My strengths are teamwork, effective communication, meeting objectives, and thriving under pressure.

experience: Below my professional experiences in short.
expertise:
Professional Skills

Always try to apply the best practices of software development, especially those based on the SOLID principles. Try to obtain code that is as readable and maintainable as possible by exploiting the concepts of clean coding. Better understand and use the React library, leveraging advanced concepts of the same.

Digital Skills

Ability to use the Linux command line. Able to use Excel spreadsheets. Knowledge of the Unity3D graphics engine alongside the C# programming language. Knowledge of Java, C#, and Javascript languages, and Ability to use GIT versioning software.
